update t_user set u_name = #{uName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, u_pwd = #{uPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, u_acc = #{uAcc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, u_identify = #{uIdentify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, u_phone = #{uPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, u_email = #{uEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_user WHERE u_acc = #{uAcc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
